trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SEQ_00<tab>Gondelimbaud appears to be waiting for you.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SEQ_01<tab>Gondelimbaud informs you that a residential district has been established in Ishgard, and that Thomelin will guide you there from the Brume.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SEQ_02<tab>With Thomelin at your side, you make way for Empyreum.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SEQ_03<tab>After arriving at Empyreum, you set out to speak with the Highmorn herald.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SEQ_04<tab>Having heard all there is to hear about Empyreum, you decide to report back to Gondelimbaud.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SEQ_05<tab>According to Gondelimbaud, the people of Ishgard are eager to welcome adventurers to Empyreum. You decide to speak with the resident caretaker for further details.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_TODO_00<tab>Speak with Thomelin, then head to Empyreum.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Thomelin, then head to Empyreum.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_TODO_02<tab>Speak with the Highmorn herald.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_TODO_03<tab>Report back to Gondelimbaud in the aetheryte plaza.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_000<tab>Ah! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I've been awaiting your return.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_001<tab>You see, after you helped bring an end to the Dragonsong War, we have striven to rebuild the city.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_002<tab>And thanks to the assistance of countless craftsmen, our efforts to restore the Firmament to its former glory are finally complete!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_003<tab>In fact, House Dzemael assembled a team of masons so skilled and efficient that they were able to finish the construction of an entirely new quarter!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_004<tab>Its name is “Empyreum,” and it was created to serve as a residential district for adventurers from across the realm.

TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_005<tab>No amount of description can truly convey its splendor, so I have asked Thomelin to escort you there that you might see for yourself. Seek him out in the Brume when you have a moment!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_010<tab>Thomelin will escort you to Empyreum. Seek him out in the Brume when you have a moment!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_THOMELIN_000_020<tab>Oh, my! 'Tis the savior of Ishgard! Perchance you've an interest in Empyreum? If so, say no more─I shall escort you there myself!

TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_THOMELIN_000_021<tab>Oh, my <var 08 E905 ((lady)) ((lord)) /var>! You've graced us with your presence once more! Perchance you've an interest in Empyreum? If so, say no more─I shall escort you there myself!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_THOMELIN_000_022<tab>And fear not: the herald will surely be happy to answer any questions you may have.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_Q1_000_000<tab>Proceed to Empyreum?
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SYSTEM_000_023<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_CARETAKER04172_000_030<tab>Welcome to Empyreum! As our restoration efforts progressed, they eventually expanded to include the construction of this little taste of heavens on earth.

TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_CARETAKER04172_000_031<tab>We are indebted to countless adventurers such as yourself who helped bring about an end to the Dragonsong War─and as thanks, we wish to provide a space for you to call home here in Ishgard.

TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_CARETAKER04172_000_032<tab>Of course, we will still require a nominal fee for any plots of land or apartments you purchase, but know that your gil will help us rebuild bigger and better than before.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_CARETAKER04172_000_033<tab>If you would like to hear more, please speak with the resident caretaker for further assistance!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_CARETAKER04172_000_040<tab>Have you been enticed by the splendor of Empyreum? If so, please speak with the resident caretaker for further assistance!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_050<tab>So, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, what did you think of Empyreum? I do hope it was to your liking!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_051<tab>Given that our borders were closed for so long, I worried that outsiders such as yourself might not take interest in this new district.
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_GONDELIMBAUD_000_052<tab>But know that it is our sincerest wish that you and other noble souls will consider making Ishgard your new home!
TEXT_AKTKYR103_04172_SYSTEM_000_053<tab>The residential district Aethernet for Empyreum can be accessed through the Ishgard aetheryte.
